import { Card, Row, Col, CardTitle, CardBody, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, } from "reactstrap"; import { useForm } from "../../hooks/useForm"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; const baseUrl= "http://localhost:3002/api/personas" async function postProducts (){ try { const response = await axios({ url: `${baseUrl}`, method: "POST" }) return } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } const Forms = () => { const [values, handleInputChange, reset] = useForm(); console.log(values) useEffect(()=>{ async function loadProducts(){ const response= await postProducts() setProducts(products) return response } loadProducts() }, []) const handleSubmit=()=>{ }; return ( {/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/} {/* Card-1*/} {/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/} Form Example
